thread.title: Kelly F
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Kelly F

author: Kelly F
title: Kelly F
text: 5 star experience...called for tires, they did a price match for me, tires in the next day. They were fast and efficient in replacing the tires and getting me back on the road before their estimated completion time. I could even watch them from the big screen while they worked on the car! Great service, friendly and accommodating.
